item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 27 Jan 2026
item.description:
1. lwt-to-eio: Automating the mechanical parts of Lwt -> Eio migration
  2. The new owners-maintainers of Dream
  3. Slipshow!
  4. Bancos: A persistent Key-Value store based on ROWEX/P-ART
  5. restricted 1.2.0 limit which system operations and which parts of the filesystem your program can access
  6. dead_code_analyzer 1.1.0
  7. OCaml security team
  8. Proposal: make the minimum tested opam 2.1 and higher
  9. csexp-query initial release
  10. Other OCaml News
